name: UIViewConfigurationState
desc: A structure that encapsulates a viewâ€™s state.

items.name: var traitCollection: UITraitCollection
items.desc: The traits that describe the current layout environment of the view, such as the user interface style and layout direction.

items.name: var isSelected: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the view is in a selected state.

items.name: var isHighlighted: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the view is in a highlighted state.

items.name: var isFocused: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the view is in a focused state.

items.name: var isDisabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the view is in a disabled state.

items.name: var isPinned: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the view is in a pinned state.

items.name: init(traitCollection: UITraitCollection)
items.desc: Creates a view configuration state with the specified trait collection.

items.name: static func == (UIViewConfigurationState, UIViewConfigurationState) -> Bool
items.desc: An operator for checking whether two view configuration states are equal.

items.name: static func != (UIViewConfigurationState, UIViewConfigurationState) -> Bool
items.desc: An operator for checking whether two view configuration states are unequal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the view configuration state by feeding them into the hasher.

items.name: var description: String
items.desc: A textual representation of this instance.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: A textual representation of this instance, suitable for debugging.

items.name: var customMirror: Mirror
items.desc: The custom mirror for this instance.
